title: Choices: Part 5
alt: I wonder what percentage of not-obviously-busy people on the street would say yes to kite-flying with a stranger. This looks like a job for Science!
transcript:
[Megan is walking towards the right of the panel.][Cueball wearing a backpack is walking towards the left of the panel.][They walk past each other.][Megan has a sudden thought, in a drawing without a frame between two panels.][Megan turns, lifts her arm, and calls out to Cueball, who then turn towards her.]
Megan: Hi.
Cueball: Uh, hi.[Only Megan is shown.]
Megan: Sorry if this is weird, but, do you like flying kites?
